description:
B.B.B. and his friends are playing in their secret base as usual when they find an old map with "Tubb Nedlog" written on it. They read it backwards and realize it says... "Golden Butt"! Is this a map leading to the legendary golden butt said to bring happiness to anyone who bites it?! The gang immediately sets out to find the golden butt - can they really find it?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Where Is It?! The Golden Butt
どこだ!? 黄金のおしり
